00001 //  AABBNODE.h
00002 //  Header file for the AABBNODE class
00003 //  Stores details for each bounding box used for collsion detection.  Each node is stored
00004 //  in each link of the AABB Linked List
00005 
00006 //  Shay Leary, March 2005
00007 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00008 
00009 #ifndef AABBNODE_H
00010 #define AABBNODE_H
00011 
00012 #include <vector>
00013 #include <gl/glut.h>
00014 //#include <GL/freeglut.h>
00015 
00016 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00017 
00018 class AABBNode
00019 {
00020 public:
00021         AABBNode () {Clear();}
00022     virtual ~AABBNode () {Clear();}
00023 
00024         //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00025 
00026         void  Clear   ();
00027 
00028         //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00029         //  Get Methods
00030         //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00031         GLdouble GetMaxX () {return m_BBox.max.x;}
00032         GLdouble GetMinX () {return m_BBox.min.x;}
00033         GLdouble GetMaxY () {return m_BBox.max.y;}
00034         GLdouble GetMinY () {return m_BBox.min.y;}
00035         GLdouble GetMaxZ () {return m_BBox.max.z;}
00036         GLdouble GetMinZ () {return m_BBox.min.z;}
00037 
00038     // Return the address of the link to the next node in the list
00039     AABBNode *GetNext () const {return m_next;}
00040 
00041         //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00042         //  Set Methods
00043         //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00044         void SetData(const GLdouble maxX, const GLdouble minX,
00045                                  const GLdouble maxY, const GLdouble minY,
00046                                  const GLdouble maxZ, const GLdouble minZ);
00047 
00048     // Set the address of the link to the next node in the list
00049     void SetNext (AABBNode *next) {m_next = next;}
00050 
00051 private:
00052     // The address of the next node in the list
00053     AABBNode *m_next;
00054 
00055         // stores x,y,z co-ordinates
00056         struct XYZ 
00057         { 
00058                 GLdouble x, y, z; 
00059         }; 
00060         // stores max and min values of co-ordinates
00061         struct BoundingBox 
00062         { 
00063                 XYZ max; 
00064                 XYZ min; 
00065         }; 
00066         // stores above info
00067         BoundingBox m_BBox;
00068 
00069         //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00070 
00071     // Privatised copy constructor and assignment operator
00072     AABBNode (const AABBNode &newNode) {};
00073     AABBNode &operator = (const AABBNode &newNode) {};
00074 };
00075 
00076 #endif
00077 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
